WINGCALIBER, TORCA and SANTON were standing next to him, waiting on

ously letting his own sense of impatience get the better of him.

> <NEW>
> 
> That erupted in a laugh over from DINOBOT, "Oh, yes. One memb=
er of your team whom got a teammate killed, and another for whom is directl=
y threatening the others. You seem to have an excellent taste in comrades, =
CONVOY." Hissing over at the MAXIMALS.
> 
> "Regardless, make up your mind?=
 What will it be, Maximals? Will you be threatening us for every single wor=
d exchanged and threatening to assault us while out of the other end of you=
r vocalizer saying you need our help? If you wish our assistance, decide wh=
at it will be. That requires you to eitehr cooperate with us and make a goo=
d show or you can go into the jungle on your own."
> 
> DINOBOT was baiting=
, attempting to drive a wedge between the MAXIMALS to either force LEO PRIM=
E to discipline them and undermine his authority, or letting them go on whi=
ch would probably lead to greater and greater tension in the field, and wou=
ld give the PREDACONS more changes for disruption should they find a way to=
 abandon the MAXIMALS. Or to get LEO PRIME to admit more of what was going =
on.
> 
> Finally, DINOBOT went to up the escalation, taking over the cue of=
 negotiation from HYDRAS. "And for our cooperation in this we have a price.=
 A stasis pod with an intact protoform and a spark. There will be no basis =
for negotiation otherwise. It would have been free given the necessity,b ut=
 given your troops have not even entered the combat zone and are pointing f=
ully armed weapons at us and threatening assault when we have given no thre=
at ourselves, there is now a price for our cooperation. Since clearly we ca=
nnot trust Maximal honor from a leader whom has no qualms about permitting =
his own personal troops to do as they wish and threaten a parlay he himself=
 invited. So, you wish our cooperation, pay our hand for it or go in on you=
r own."
> 
> OOC - Anyways, Hydras/Leo Prime, this is DINOBOT taking a cue =
to try and drive a wedge further into the Maximals and Leo Prime's authorit=
y, given they're giving him a rather significant opening, and given his dat=
a files over on them. He's going to try and bait them directly to either di=
srupt things for further chaos later. IT's a more subtle and Predacon thing=
 to do, so I'll let you decide where to run with it. And Hydras, request yo=
u let DINOBOT play it out then given you would probably trust him in this a=
nd it humilaites the Maximals as well.
